thread.title: Very good overnight stay
thread.title_full: Very good overnight stay - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: GrumpsDC
title: Very good overnight stay
text: We stayed here overnight when in town to see two of our sons prior to the England vs Italy game the next day. A great evening out, drinking and eating, was finished off with a very nice stay here - friendly service, a spacious and clean room. Not sure that we could have asked for much more?
